name: haar

a cold mist coming from the sea to the east of Scotland or northern England: The haar was just lifting and the sun struggling through. Even in summer sea haar can reduce visibility to just metres.
More examplesFewer examplesOutside, a haar obliterates everything in its greyness. On a high ridge above the loch we drove into a dense haar.There will be scattered showers across the country today, along with patchy haar on the East Coast.
